name: spo-webhook-subscription-maintenance
title: Maintain and Replace SharePoint List Webhook Subscriptions
shortDescription: This script checks SharePoint sites and specific list, removes old webhook URLs, and adds or replaces them with updated Power Automate webhook subscriptions.
longDescription: This PowerShell script helps maintain and replace SharePoint list webhook subscriptions across multiple sites. It identifies existing webhook subscriptions, removes old webhook URLs, and replaces them with updated Power Automate webhook subscriptions. The script includes retry logic for reliability and exports detailed results to a CSV file.
